Description: Pottery ostracon, with one line of incised inscription - Coptic (?), inside rim painted with black and white bands, partly obscured by black organic substance.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394061) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394061)
